channel.title: 13th Birthday :tada:
channel.description:
Hi fedizens! :)
This year it's the 13th anniversary [1] of the Fediverse! :tada: And [Fedicat organizes a meeting](https://barcelona.social/notice/A7EXSMC5KteJ18VBRY) in catalan and spanish. We will meet in a BBB thanks to [eXO](https://exo.cat) (guifinet).
If english/french/esperantist people wants to set up a meeting, I hope I can be there too. I also wrote a post in my blog (in catalan):
* gemini: gemini://gemlog.gamifi.cat/glog/2021-05-11_fedi_13.gmi * bigWeb: https://proxy.vulpes.one/gemini/gemlog.gamifi.cat/glog/2021-05-11_fedi_13.gmi
[1] Evan's first post <https://web.archive.org/web/20130531232111/http://identi.ca/notice/1>
#Fediverse13 #HappyFedi2U

item.title: 13th Birthday :tada:
item.dc:creator: aschrijver
item.description:
4 posts were split to a new topic: Help brainstorm a FUN campaign for Fedi’s birthday

Read full topic

item.title: 13th Birthday :tada:
item.dc:creator: aschrijver
item.description:
Yes, I also heard about it by @lightone of Fediverse Party who - like every year - wants to organize something special to celebrate. We are thinking about creating a post and a hashtag campaign, where this year we’d like to ‘flash-mob’ it to traditional social media, and attract some positive attention to fedi. Maybe by creating a whole bunch of funny memes for that.

I’ll pass this on to fediverse.party team (where I co-maintain the wiki), who may want to join SocialHub anyway

Read full topic

item.title: 13th Birthday :tada:

item.description:
Hi fedizens!

This year it’s the 13th anniversary [1] of the Fediverse! And Fedicat organizes a meeting in catalan and spanish. We will meet in a BBB thanks to eXO (guifinet).

If english/french/esperantist people wants to set up a meeting, I hope I can be there too. I also wrote a post in my blog (in catalan):
